code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://assignmate-backend-76bd.onrender.com/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL});export const authAPI={login:credentials=>api.post('/auth/login',credentials),register:userData=>api.post('/auth/register',userData)};export const assignmentAPI={getAssignments:()=>api.get('/assignments'),getAssignment:id=>api.get("/assignments/".concat(id)),createAssignment:formData=>api.post('/assignments',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}),deleteAssignment:id=>api.delete("/assignments/".concat(id))};export const submissionAPI={getSubmissions:()=>api.get('/submissions'),getMySubmissions:studentId=>api.get("/submissions/my-submissions/".concat(studentId)),submitAssignment:(assignmentId,formData)=>api.post("/submissions/".concat(assignmentId),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}),gradeSubmission:(id,data)=>api.put("/submissions/".concat(id,"/grade"),data)};export default api;
